About Us

Do you need an emergency dentist in Fort Wayne, IN? We are ready and waiting for your call! 509-413-0112

We are, quite simply, a group of dentists who want to make a change. Our aim is to provide a fun, enjoyable and accessible experience for all patients.

We understand how difficult it can be to get an appointment at the dentist, taking a day off work, waiting for hours and reading boring yachting magazines.

We want to change your experience.

The team atÂ Emergency Dentist Fort WayneÂ understand that some patients may not have been to see a dentist for over 10 years, we do not mind at all. We are more than happy to see anyone, no one has to be registered. Simply call us and turn up! We want you to be seen within the hour no matter what time of the day it is.

None of our dentists will judge you. Whether you smoke, eat sweets and chocolates all day and night, guzzle on fizzy drinks for breakfasts ultimately we want to serve you and take away the pain. No one will make you feel less important.

Our team will ensure your journey is as comfortable as possible. We want to give you the most painless treatment available so you can get home as soon as possible.

After your appointment with us, we hope you donâ€™t hate the dentist anymore, in fact, we hope you may just like the dentist (hereâ€™s hoping)!

Call Us Today!
